posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public int reverse(int x) {--newline--            long rev= 0;--newline--            while( x != 0){--newline--                rev= rev*10 + x % 10;--newline--                x= x/10;--newline--                if( rev > Integer.MAX_VALUE || rev < Integer.MIN_VALUE)--newline--                    return 0;--newline--            }--newline--            return (int) rev;--newline--        }--newline--}

posts.cpp: class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--    int reverse(int x) {--newline--        long long res = 0;--newline--        while(x) {--newline--            res = res*10 + x%10;--newline--            x /= 10;--newline--        }--newline--        return (res<INT_MIN || res>INT_MAX) ? 0 : res;--newline--    }--newline--};

class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--    int reverse(int x) {--newline--        int ans = 0;--newline--        while (x) {--newline--            int temp = ans * 10 + x % 10;--newline--            if (temp / 10 != ans)--newline--                return 0;--newline--            ans = temp;--newline--            x /= 10;--newline--        }--newline--        return ans;--newline--    }--newline--};
